message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $110?

I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but $110 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to compromise, though! How about we meet in the middle at $130? It's a great price for a product of this quality, and I think you'll really appreciate it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $130 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'd be willing to go up to $120, but no more. Can you meet me at $120?
